import React from 'react'; import './News.css'; const News = () => { // Sample news data - replace with actual content const featuredPosts = [ { id: 1, title: 'Annual Cultural Festival Announcement', excerpt: 'Join us for our biggest celebration of Edo culture in Italy this summer...', image: '/news/festival-announcement.jpg', date: '2024-03-15', category: 'Events' }, { id: 2, title: 'New Cultural Exchange Program', excerpt: 'We are excited to announce our new partnership with Italian cultural institutions...', image: '/news/exchange-program.jpg', date: '2024-03-10', category: 'Programs' } ]; const recentPosts = [ { id: 3, title: 'Traditional Dance Workshop Success', excerpt: 'Last weekend\'s traditional dance workshop saw an overwhelming response...', image: '/news/dance-workshop.jpg', date: '2024-03-05', category: 'Workshops' }, { id: 4, title: 'Community Outreach Initiative', excerpt: 'Our community outreach program has reached a new milestone...', image: '/news/community-outreach.jpg', date: '2024-03-01', category: 'Community' }, // Add more posts here ]; const formatDate = (dateString) => { return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-GB', { day: 'numeric', month: 'long', year: 'numeric' }); }; return (

News & Updates

Stay updated with the latest news, events, and stories from our community

Featured Stories

{featuredPosts.map(post => (
{post.category}
{formatDate(post.date)}

{post.title}

{post.excerpt}

))}

Recent Updates

{recentPosts.map(post => (
{post.category}
{formatDate(post.date)}

{post.title}

{post.excerpt}

))}

Categories

  • Events (5)
  • Programs (3)
  • Workshops (4)
  • Community (6)

Archives

  • March 2024 (8)
  • February 2024 (6)
  • January 2024 (5)
); }; export default News;
